Remote, Front end Developer, Triggit

As a web based company, Triggit has a variety of front end development based needs. From UI/UX implementation, to advertising creative template engines, there are many chances to expand your skills as well as gain experience in a variety of tech.

This position is 100% remote and will require strong communication skills, video chat availability, and a strong work ethic with dedication. We coordinate with IRC, Github, and other tools to execute effectively.

Apply at: https://hire.jobvite.com/j?cj=olVMYfwK&s=hacker_news
